colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I YUM MCHOG RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DKAR MO LA BSTOD PA, TSE DANG YE SHES SKUL BAR BYED PA'I RIN PO CHE @003B ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DZA SAG BLA MA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL SOGS DAM PA 'DI NYID LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA CAN RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NYE BAR BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SNYAN DAG GO BRDAB SOGS KYIS MA BCINGS PAR GO BDE BAR SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
